description: A ready to deploy kubernetes cluster with 1 Master and 2 (Linux)Worker Nodes
summary: A Simple template to Deploy 1 Master and 2 Worker node (All Ubuntu 18.04) with kubernetes packages kubeadm, kubelet, kubectl & docker. Uses a script to install all packages. You need to initialize cluster by using `kubeadm init` on Master and then `kubeadm join` on Worker nodes
